cards.title: Sport picture of the day / Mexican waves

item.title: Sport picture of the day: Mexican waves
item.trailText: AFP photographer Damien Meyer has put his underwater camera to good use to capture this great shot of the Mexican team suspended upside down in the pool as they compete in the 2015 Pan American Games in Toronto
item.standFirst: How do you solve a problem like photographing synchronized swimmers underwater? You use an underwater camera thatâ€™s how. AFP photographer Damien Meyer has put his one to good use to capture this great shot of the Mexican team suspended upside down in the pool as they compete in the 2015 Pan American Games in Toronto

displayImages.altText:
TOPSHOTS
The Mexican Synchronized Swimmers compete during the Team Technical Routine at the 2015 Pan American Games in Toronto, Ontario on July 9, 2015. AFP PHOTO / DAMIEN MEYERDAMIEN MEYER/AFP/Getty Images

headerImage.caption: The Mexican synchronized swimmers compete during the Team Technical Routine at the 2015 Pan American Games in Toronto, Ontario, where they took second place. Photograph: Damien Meyer/AFP/Getty Images
headerImage.altText: The Mexican synchronized swimmers compete during the Team Technical Routine at the 2015 Pan American Games in Toronto, Ontario, where they took second place.
